item.title: Second Lesson October 8th 2020
item.description: Second Lesson Welcome to the second lesson - 08/10/2020 8:00 - 12:30 Zoom meeting We will use Zoom. You can connect to zoom: following this link: (https://grenoble-inp.zoom.us/j/96523553208?pwd=NWZEajhVTmNlbTRCbFk2QS9aZmtGUT09) (and, if needed, install the zoom app). or you can start the Zoom app with the following information meeting ID: 965 2355 3208 Password: SABD2020 Class platforms Caseine page is: (https://moodle.caseine.org/course/view.php?id=644) Class material Visualization and GIS Introduction to Vizu Introduction to Vizu

item.title: First Lesson October 1rst 2020
item.description: First Lesson Welcome to the first lesson - 01/10/2020 9:30 - 12:30 Zoom meeting We will use Zoom. You can connect to zoom: following this link: (https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81000095315?pwd=Vng2U3FFRDFxVC95S2FPSWhoMXNtQT09) (and, if needed, install the zoom app). or you can start the Zoom app with the following information meeting ID: 810 0009 5315 Password: SABD Class platforms Depending on the teacher, we will use Chamilo and/or Caseine
